name: Torn Eau de Parfum with Vanilla + Vetiver
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands..Key Notes: Vanilla, Musk, Sandalwood..Fragrance Description: The richness of vanilla bean blends with the earthiness of vetiver roots to create a fragrance that is both spicy and floral...About the Bottle: Henry Rose crafts their bottles to be genderless, modern, and minimal. The clear glass highlights their commitment to 100 percent ingredient transparency. The travel-sized fragrances are made from 30 percent recycled glass. The cartons are from biodegradable FSC hemp paper. The caps are recyclable...About the Fragrance: I wanted to highlight the Vanilla Bean. From its powerful, familiar warmth, to its sweet yet spicy appeal. To accentuate the richness of Vanilla, a smooth bed of Sandalwood envelops the scent with an alluring charm and unforgettable opulence that lingers.u2014Yves Cassar, Perfumer.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Methyldihydrojasmonate, Vanillin, Pentamethylcyclopent-3-Ene-Butanol, 2-Ethyl-4-(2,2,3-Trimethyl-3-Cyclopenten-1-Yl)-2-Buten-1-Ol, Propanedioic Acid, 1-(3,3-Dimethylcyclohexyl)Ethyl Ethyl Ester, Ethylene Brassylate, Pogostemon Cablin (Patchouli) Oil, Dipropylene Glycol , Tetrahydro-Methyl-Methylpropyl)-Pyran-4-Ol , Ethyl Vanillin, Oxacycloheptadec-10-En-2-One, Beta-Ionone, Cyclopentadecanone, Hexadecanolide, Ethyl Maltol, Linalyl Acetate, Linalool, Dodecahydro-Tetramethylnaphthofuran, Benzyl Acetate, 3,3-Dimethyl-5-(2,2,3-Trimethyl-3-Cyclopenten-1-Yl)-4-Penten-2-Ol, Gamma-Octalactone , Phenethyl Alcohol, Cyclopropanemethanol, 1-Methyl-2-[(1,2,2-Trimethylbicyclo[3.1.0]Hex-3-Yl)Methyl]-, Phenylisohexanol , Vetiveria Zizanioides (Vetiver) Oil , 4-Methyl-3-Decen-5-Ol, Triethyl Citrate, Vanilla Planifolia (Vanilla) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol , Ionone, Alpha, Dimethylheptenal, Methyl Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Cis-3-Hexenyl Acetate , Citric Acid , Tetradibutyl Pentaerithrityl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate , Benzyl Alcohol , Eugenol , Farnesol , Limonene...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz / 50 mL eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_title: Black tie and pink bow approved
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!! if you want that elegant and richness feel, nice subtle musk with a side of jazzy vanilla that will take you to the roaring 20s. Give this a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair
reviews.review_text: If this one didn't fade within a minute or so, it would be my favorite by far from this line.  A divine woodsy vanilla and oh, am I picky.  Amateur brands such as 7 Virtues and Skylar aren't even anywhere close to my radar, for instance.  But my favorite from this brand will remain Queens followed by Flora.  And my all time favorite (I can only tolerate clean fragrances) is Commodity Gold Bold (an amazing vanilla woods that lasts hours).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Just received these two Hebry Rose perfumes. Haven't used either. One bottle has a fair amount less fluid than the other. Annoying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do have to say that fragrance interacts differently with everyoneu2019s skin. With that being said I LOVE this perfume. Iu2019ve gotten the most compliments wearing this than any other fragrance Iu2019ve worn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Instant headache as soon as I sprayed it. Grandma but make it vanilla vibes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No hints of vanilla  Reminded me of black orchid after it dried down  I will be returning this item

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have over 200 bottles of perfume and I donu2019t have anything like this one!  Itu2019s so cozy and unique!  So glad I was able to add this to my collection and excited to try more from this line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always loved Torn by Henry Rose.  I have ordered it several times. It had become my 'go to scent. Unfortunately, my last bottle that I purchased a month ago, is changed.  The scent would last hours, I got multiple compliments, now it fades immediately. Like a watered-down version of the old formula. I wrote to Henry Rose; they say they haven't changed it. Once again us consumers know better. I have a friend who uses another HR scent, and she says the same, it's just a much lighter version than the original of 3 yrs. ago. It's sad, as now I have to once again go back to the drawing board. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is marketed as a vanilla gourmand scent but all I can smell is the overwhelming vetiver which is fine but not what I was looking for

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I never order fragrance online but I took a chance. The vanilla is really nice and reminds me of Nest Madagascar vanilla, but then torn has a really nice overall smell that is slightly masculine but still can be feminine.. I'm terrible at describing fragrance but I think it can be very gender neutral. It's not a stinky perfume that overpowers, to me it feels clean. It definitely lasts most of the day without being overpowering, it lingers in the best way. I've never received so many compliments on a fragrance before, from both women and men! (I feel like that doesn't usually happen). I ordered the trial size but I definitely want the full size now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This reminds me of vanilla orchid by floral street which iu2019m not a fan of. Both have a weird note in them thatu2019s very bitter on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I took a chance on this perfume based on the Fragrance finder test , which I have NEVER done before , and I couldn't be more thrilled ! This scent smells divine on me. It lasts for long time and I get compliments EVERY time I wear it. Best Blind buy ever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my male coworkers wears D&G The One and he always smells fantastic. Torn smells very similar, but I donu2019t find it to be softer and less overtly masculine. I like it..

reviews.review_title: Not What You Think It Will Smell Like...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i paid for this.  Automatically disappointed.  This is not what a normal vanilla smells like.  It smells salty almost.  Really only the tiniest hint of sweetness.  it definitely smells niche.  But I wasn't expecting this scent.   Once I get over that fact and it dries down for 10 minutes or so, it starts to settle into my skin more.  But this is a woody musky kinda of fragrance.  It reminds me of one of the older Skylar fragrances.  It's ok, but not what I thought I was buying from the notes (or the great reviews).. and also nothing that special.. and definitely nothing that's blowing me away.       2.5 STARS

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nice smell but does not last more than 30 min and projection and silage is absent. Not FB worthy for the ridiculous price. The dupe is floral street wild vanilla orchid.  Will buy that one instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is perfect for me! It is so soft yet sweet with just the right amount of vanilla. It also lasts a very long time. I have gotten so many complements I am so pleased with this perfume that I was gifted by Henry Rose. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in LOVE! This is my first Henry Rose fragrance and wow, what an impressive first impression. This is BETTER than all other high end/luxury brand fragrances I own. Torn is a warm hug on a winter day. Itu2019s warm, spicy, and a hint of sweet. If you love vanilla, youu2019ll love Torn. The best part is it lasts the entire day and then some lol. Absolutely love. Gifted by HenryRose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OK I totally understand the brand direction now that Iu2019ve smelled the scent. This is definitely a unisex fragrance where it smells like sexy and sultry. I canu2019t tell if itu2019s my preferred fragrance, but I feel like this is good for going out night. Gifted by henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this perfume. Itu2019s very similar to Char, but Torn is slightly spicier from the ginger. It pulls nice and warm on me, but not overly sweet which makes it a really nice layering scent. I can imagine this would layer nicely with baccarat rouge! Lasted a few hours on skin. This was gifted by Henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this Henry Rose Torn Eau De Parfum complimentary from Henry Rose. If I see vanilla as a scent note, I definitely will try the fragrance! ud83dudda4  Torn is a spicy fragrance with rich vanilla bean blends and the earthiness of vetiver roots. They blend together and create a spicy and floral fragrance. ud83dudda4  Torn has a wide variety of floral and woody ingredients that blend together to give a unique fragrance experience. At first I really didnu2019t like this scent, but the more I wore it, the more I could smell the different fragrance notes and the more it grew on me! ud83dudda4  I really like that I can smell the vanilla amongst the other scent notes. This fragrance isnu2019t sweet at all and is definitely earthy. I believe the first time I sprayed this Parfum I must have caught a whiff of the rose, which is the one fragrance I absolutely despise. I love that every time I wear Torn, I smell a different scent note, ultimately taking me on a fragrance adventure. ud83dudda4

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the richness of the scent of vanilla bean in this. It blends so nicely with the earthiness of vetiver roots. This fragrance is all at once sweet and floral and spicy. I also love the bottle! So pretty! Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Torn - Eau De Parfum complimentary from Henry Rose in exchange for my honest review. This fragrance is absolutely intoxicating. It is sweet and gloral with notes of freesia and jasmine swirled into a warm vanilla base. It is my perfect go-to fragrance for every occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has such a great scent to it. I love the overall warmness, along with the hints of vanilla. This is a great fall scent. The smell lasts long and pairs well with other scents. This has definitely become one of my staple scents. This was gifted to me by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This new perfume gifted by Henry Rose is the perfect cozy, yet sexy fall/winter scent. I am obsessed with this luxurious perfume and received so many compliments when I wore it. Itu2019s long lasting and did not fade much throughout the day. This perfume is definitely a winner in my eyes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Recently I was gifted by Henry Rose this perfume in exchange for my honest opinion. I have been trying Torn for a few weeks and I think this is probably one of their more unisex scent. I definitely smell more vanilla than other note, then the after note feel smokey and sexy. It is definitely a statement scent. It last about 6-7 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had the chance to try out all the fragrances from Henry Rose, TORN is definitely one of my least favorites. Itu2019s very strong warm and spicy. Itu2019s a unisex scent and I definitely see both men and women wearing this but itu2019s just not for me. In my opinion itu2019s very strong and not a pleasant smell for me. My mother on the other hand likes it! I will say these fragrances seem to be better liked by older women. I was gifted by Henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite nighttime cents! This beautiful perfume has notes of rose and warm spice. Itu2019s deep, rich and super sexy! Iu2019m looking forward to testing this out in the winter months because I feel like it has really beautiful warm notes to it. Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_title: The LBD of fragrances- it goes with everything!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well-rounded.  Harmonious.  Balanced.  Understated.  Those are the words that immediately come to mind.  Everything from the packaging to the blend of notes is effortless and unpretentious.  It is neither purely masculine nor purely feminine, but rather a true unisex scent.  When first spraying it, I get the musky, spiced and woody qualities of the sandalwood and patchouli.  Over time, the subtle creaminess of the vanilla bean peaks through.  On my skin, I did not detect any of the floral notes.  The overall vibe I get makes me think of sitting by a crackling fire and taking in its warmth.  Very cozy and comforting.  Not very sweet, but never sharp or bitter either.  This fragrance can be dressed up or down and worn day or night.  Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful and elegant perfume by henry rose! Its has floral and vanilla note that is different than all the perfumes I have! It is definitely one of my favorite from henry rose, I got lots of compliments on this one and I would definitely recommend torn! Gifted by henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Torn by Henry Rose is a beautiful woody powdery gourmand. This fragrance would be best suited for evening or during cool weather. I pick up some similarities to Tom Ford Black Orchid, but this is lighter and sweeter. The bottle is simple and beautiful. I love that this is a u201c cleanu201d and cruelty free fragrance brand! received this product was gifted by Henry Rose in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Torn - Eau De Parfum was gifted to me for my honest opinion.   I love the bottle, classic and simple. I use it before work and I still can smell the scent after a 9 hour day, definitely has lasting power!  Itu2019s a nice musky scent though I prefer something lighter and more floral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely loving this scent from Henry Rose ! I think it's the most blind buy safe of the 4 I've tried and it's a sweet but not too sweet vanilla scent , I swear it has a fruit note but it's not listed anywhere! If you love vanilla scents you'll love this , I've been wearing it non stop and have gotten a lot of compliments! Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: wow i am so impressed! this is the perfect scent for anyone, anytime. it has strong vanilla notes and I can really smell the vetiver. itu2019s more on the sweet side. the scent is very long lasting too! gifted by henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Torn is such an intoxicating scent! Itu2019s the grown up vanilla of my dreams. Perfect on its own and great for layering and can be worn day or night! Itu2019s super sexy by not overpowering. I honestly cannot say enough good things about it. It also lasts super well on my skin! I can smell it hours later which is just what I want out of my fragrances. I received this complimentary from Henry Rose but will be purchasing more with my own funds!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, the scent was disappointing. Torn was supposed to be this sweet vanilla scent, but I got musky and woody instead.  Not that it's a  bad scent, its a pretty decent unisex scent but it's not what it was advertised to be either. For the price especially, this was disappointing :(. Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this fragrance complimentary from Henry Rose.  Ambery, earthy, boozy, vanilla with some aromatics. I find this combination a bit odd, to my nose those notes just donu2019t work together. I like this fragrance after about 3-4 hours of wearing, it settles into a creamy, cozy vanilla with some earthiness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has quickly become my staple fragrance. I really enjoy vanilla notes in perfumes and this wasnu2019t the exception. It is definitely on the sweet side, so if you like that kind of scent you will love this one. Also, it lasts all day. Iu2019ve been getting compliments since I started using it! Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Torn Eau de Parfum was gifted to me by Henry Rose. This was my first experience trying a Henry Rose perfume created by Michelle Pfeiffer. Henry Rose is EWG verified hypoallergenic.  I love the packaging! The bottle is a beautiful clear glass with a black top and comes with 1.7 oz / 50 mL of the perfume.   Perfume Notes: Top: Freesia and Muguet Middle: Rose, Violet, and Jasmine Bottom: Sandalwood, Musk, Patchouli, Vanilla Bean, and Praline  This perfume can be worn either at home or going out on the town. Vanilla is one of my favorite scents and it is perfectly with the other notes. I feel beautiful and confident wearing Torn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume complimentary from Henry rose. The perfume is warm and spicy from the sandalwood and the sweetness from vanilla. This is a beautiful and elegant scent from the brand. It is a perfect fall weather or evening time fragrance given the warmth it brings

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Henry Rose.      I love this fragrance, it seriously stays for a long time. I sprayed it on a hoodie that I wore and I can still smell it 3 days later?! How is that possible right? Definitely worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is lovely for the fall time or evening time. My favorite Henry Rose perfume that Iu2019ve tried so far! It has spicy notes mixed with vanilla that lasts all day long. I love the final scent it leaves after being settled into the skin for a couple of minutes. Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Henry Rose gifted me this perfume. This perfume has a very elegant scent. I smell this perfume and it reminds me of a wonderful day. An important day and one that was very remarkable. It is a spicy and attractive smell. I really loved the smell of this perfume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Torn Eau De Parfum gifted by Henry Rose is so elegant. I like the sweet and soft scent of this clean perfume. The scent is perfect for day or night, I do reapply it for the evening since the scent fades during the day. The bottle looks very beautiful to display.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been LOVING this perfume! The scent is perfect for day or night wear. I've been wearing it to work and I have been getting so many compliments on it. I love the look of the bottle, its so classy but chic looking. I keep it out on my counter in my bathroom. Gifted by henryrose

reviews.review_title: Warm vanilla mixes with earthy floral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the mix of sandalwood & vanilla with the florals! It seems in layers you can detect the earthy scents, then florals and sometimes they mix and mingle! It's a new favorite! I always enjoy a unisex warm & spicy scent! This one is, for me, more earthy & warm than floral! Which I prefer! Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted to me by Henry Rose in exchange for my honest thoughts. If you like spicy and floral scents then this is for you. The touch of Vanilla in this just mellows out the scent as a whole. Definitely check it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted By Henry Rose. I love how simple the packaging and bottle is. Itu2019s so minimal but it speaks loudly and the scent speaks even louder! I love the warm scent of the vanilla. It is tied perfectly together with the sandalwood. It is very fragrant and long lasting on me. I love to wear at home when Iu2019m relaxing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was gifted by Henryrose. Not only are these fragrances safe to wear but they smell amazing. I love how these scents can also be layered for an entirely new fragrance too. It was subtle and warm with that wonderful vanilla scent and at the end of the day, the scent is still there. Anyone who is looking for the perfect vanilla scent will not be disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the warm scent. It is woodsy and sweet without being overpowering. It last a long time and one spray is enough to get the full fragrance.I donu2019t usually wear fragrance because of my allergies but this didnu2019t cause me any issues. This was gifted to me for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A refreshing scent with a simplistically beautiful bottle, it smells soft and sweet, a great spring scent or early summer. Lasts through the day, not overwhelming in any way. I recommend this one for anyone looking for a soft smell. Gifted by Henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Torn Eau De Parfum is a very strong fragrance that stays on forever and brings out the best floral notes. Has a good performance and as someone who is sensitive to strong fragrances , this doesnu2019t bother me at all. I love it so much and I received it complimentary from Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My immediate description would be sweet, floral, musky spice, with a cloud of vanilla. I'm not usually into spice in my fragrances, but there's this wonderful balance of warm and earthy notes that makes it so enjoyable for me. I love that it's not overpowering but enough to awaken my senses and others around me. I am so impressed with how they bottled up this natural goodness and have such wonderful longevity. This would be perfect to wear for the fall and winter seasons, but I'll be layering it so I could wear it all year long. Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Henry Rose for an honest review. Torn is such a gorgeous scent! I love how it smells. Itu2019s the perfect sweet scent that you can layer with others. Itu2019s not at all cloyingly sweet, and feels very balanced and elegant. I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Torn is one of my favorite scents of Henry Rose! It has a warm and spicy scent that reminds me of fall. One spritz lasts majority of the day also so thatu2019s a plus. This perfume has notes of vanilla and musk, so it smells amazing. Gifted by henryrose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was quiet disappointed when I received this perfume because I do not smell the vanilla. It is very musky, which I love, but it is overwhelming in my opinion. It also smelled very different when I sprayed it onto my skin. Apart from the smell, I do love the packaging. It is very simple yet chic. If you're looking for a musky and cigarette smoke kind of perfume, this is the one for you. This perfume was gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Henry Rose Torn is unlike any fragrance in my collection. Itu2019s unique, and yet itu2019s somehow familiar with its warm and inviting allure. For me, its richness is deeply rooted in the vanilla bean notes, and this remains from first spray to the last detectable note on my skin. But, as it dries down on me, the vanilla intensity changes from spicy and warm to lightly powdery to an almost caramel. A lovely fragrance that is a mix of everythingu2014warm, spicy, a little earthy, a little musky. And surprisingly, everything comes together in a perfect balance. This is a scent that took a few wears to really win me over, but it is one that I truly enjoy. (Received complimentary from Henry Rose).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Complimentary from Henry Rose, Overall the perfume smells very nice. I though it would have more vanilla & unfortunately it doesnu2019t. It is a pretty subtle scent and one that can be used daily. Not bad but a little disappointing that you cannot smell one of the key notes very much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Henry Rose, and it has become a staple and daily go to! It has a woodsy floral scent that isnu2019t overwhelming and has shown to last throughout the day. I will definitely be trying more scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Henry Rose. Warm and spicy scent, perfect for fall. The top notes are vanilla, musk and sandalwood. Performance of the perfume is also pretty good. All in all I really like it, and will be wearing this scent a lot this fall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Henry Rose and I am so happy I did! I have been a long time fan of the brand and am so happy I finally had the opportunity to try one of their products. Torn smells delightful, the scent is very light but personally I think that works well for me. I also love the simple ingredients of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: TORN by Henry Rose is a true gem in the fragrance world. This scent is absolutely amazing with its incredible sillage that gets attention wherever you go. You can't help but be captivated be the trail it leaves. But that's not all u2013 the longevity of TORN is simply remarkable. It stays with you throughout the day. If youu2019re looking for a scent that leaves a lasting impression, TORN is an absolute must-have. received gifted by the brand

reviews.review_title: A bit powdery at first then vanilla
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Torn! It does have vanilla bean in it but the inital spray doesn't smell sweet at all, but I'm wearing Torn and a few hours later the dry down is a bit sweet with a hint of vanilla.  This is a nice and fairly universal fragrance as lasts and has enough body but smells sophisticated and well blended, not obnoxious and sweet like gourmand fragrances.  Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a gorgeous fragrance! It is warm and inviting with the scents of vanilla and musk. It's such a sensual and sexy fragrance, definitely unlike anything I have smelled before. It's perfect for anytime of the year. It's not too overpowering - it's light but definitely noticeable. I love it! My new favorite fragrance. Gifted by henryrose but these opinions are 100% my own!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent reminds of cashmere and silk. Luxurious and hot. Also reminds me of holidays and dressing up. I loved how it literally stays all day long and I've gotten many compliments when I wore this perfume.  Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Indulge in the delightful scent of Vanilla Bean with this warm and long-lasting fragrance. You'll be impressed by its unique and earthy undertones of vetiver roots. This fragrance is truly one-of-a-kind, and you won't be able to get enough of it. Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying out a perfume from the fragrance family of Warm & Spicy, and let me tell you, it was an absolutely delightful experience. The scent type of Warm & Sweet Gourmand perfectly captured my attention, and the key notes of vanilla, musk, sandalwood, and vetiver created a beautiful symphony of aromas that I couldn't get enough of.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Now THIS is what quality perfume should be! The scent itself is amazing but the best part in my opinion is how long it lasts. A little goes a long way. I only have to apply once in the morning, lightly, and the fragrance stays with me all day. Also the notes seem to change as they react to my skin. After a while I detected a sweet cigar aroma, not overpowering, just a hint. A mesmerizing potion! gifted by henryrose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the fragrance itu2019s floral and just in time perfect for summer. Enjoy the fresh and delicious scent it last longer than 3 hr which I am happy about. Highly recommend gifted by Henry rose in exchange

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is a warm and spicy scent that is perfect for the cozy and warm vibes. It smells really soft but also has the perfect hint of spice that makes this perfect for everyday use or for a night out. So happy to have this be gifted by Henry Rose!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: An earthy vanilla fragrance? I can easily say  - I don't own anything in my fragrance collection quite like this - and I have quite a little collection.   With Torn, you get the raw earthiness in the opening which then dries down to a spicy, floral concoction with the vanilla always lingering yet not overly dominant.   This fragrance is a true example of notes perfectly in harmony. Each one plays its role and is detectable, yet doesn't overpower the other.   Earthy, Warm, Woody, Floral, Musky, Sweet.... all of these you get from Torn... yet it smells uncomplicated and refined.   This scent makes me feel put-together, elegant and sophisticated - even if I'm just wearing jeans and a tank top. It's  simply wonderful.  This is a  high quality fragrance that comes in a beautiful, simple bottle. Being a huge fragrance lover, Henry Rose is officially on my radar and I know I'll need to try out more from this brand.    Complimentary from Henry Rose

reviews.review_title: Torn, an ok scent. Not for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received Torn by Henry Rose complimentary from Henry Rose in exchange for review.  The scent is a bit mature for me and I am 51. It is reminiscent of something I have smelled before.  The description did not match the actual scent in my opinion.  The vanilla and patchouli does not come thru enough for me up on first applying. It is very powdery which covers the other notes. I don't get the vetiver or any spicy notes. Very synthetic smelling overall.  The longevity is moderate and as the initial scent dissipates, the sillage is short and that is when I begin to smell the vanilla. It lasts a couple hours overall.  I'll be passing this onto my grandmother.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Henry Rose and has seriously become my new favorite perfume! I LOVE the way it smells - itu2019s very sweet and has a strong vanilla scent with a hint of flowers. I literally canu2019t stop wearing it, Iu2019ve gotten so many compliments on it too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It took me a few days of usage to figure out if I lived this scent at all. It has much more of an Amber musk scent than I was anticipating. It is nice though. It is strong though! I use one of two pumps MAX. The scent is very long lasting. Iu2019ve been putting it on before bed and I can still catch whiffs of it the next morning. Somewhat masculine scent but not much! Very woodsy musk. Gifted by Henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Henry Rose's Torn Eau de Parfum is an exquisite fragrance that effortlessly captures the essence of elegance and sophistication. From the moment I first experienced its enchanting scent, I knew I had discovered something truly special. Torn opens with a burst of vibrant citrus notes, immediately invigorating the senses and creating a feeling of freshness. As the fragrance evolves, the heart notes of delicate rose petals and jasmine beautifully intertwine, adding a romantic and feminine touch. The base notes of warm amber and musk provide a comforting and sensual foundation that lingers on the skin, creating an alluring aura. What sets Torn apart is its perfect balance of floral and woody elements. It seamlessly combines the lightness of the floral bouquet with the depth and richness of the woody undertones, creating a harmonious symphony of scents. This duality makes Torn a versatile fragrance that can be worn both during the day and in the evening, effortlessly transitioning from casual outings to more formal occasions. gifted by henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my gosh! Torn is one of my favorite perfumes, and I can't get enough of it. This is one of the freshest-smelling products that I have ever used. This is a typical perfume that you would use on a daily basis, and you never get bored with it.  complimentary from henryrose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

It is more of a winter or nighttime scent for me. It smells warm, comforting and interesting. This smells like a safe place that you want to go to. I really enjoy this scent and I will wear it more in the cooler seasons. Gifted by Henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is simple and clean, just like the ingredients used to create u201cTornu201d.   I am huge fan of warm vanilla fragrances but Torn isnu2018t a typical vanilla scent. The floral and slightly fruity opening is very strong and caught me completely off guard. Torn transforms into a more subtle scent almost immediately and becomes more enjoyable. I especially enjoy the dry down. Itu2019s a bit spicy, a touch powdery, and at the same time you can smell the florals and the warmth from the base notes. The more I wear it, the more I like it. It isnu2019t the most complex or u201ewowingu201c scent and almost feels a little boring compared to some other fragrances. Since Torn is very inoffensive, it would make a great choice for a day at the office but it can also be worn for a date night.  Unisex scents are usually a hit or miss for me but Torn is a true unisex scent. Itu2019s neither masculine nor feminine and can be worn by anyone young or old.   Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_text: Torn by Henry Rose is a sophisticated and sensual fragrance. Thatu2019s perfect for people who enjoy a more complex ascent. Finally, the fragrance settles into a warm base of patchouly Amber and Muska, creating a deep and sensual aroma so, definitely a complex scent I like that itu2019s unique and long lasting. Gifted by Henry rose. Tip: I think this would be perfect for a night out or a special occasions. I donu2019t think this would make a good everyday wear to the office scent.

reviews.review_text: This perfume was gifted by Henry Rose and here is my sincere thoughts on it. I have been looking for a perfume that is a memorable scent one that is a moody type of perfume. While this scent u201cTornu201d is nice I wish it was more vanilla like. Spicy is definitely a good and accurate description of this scent. I just think itu2019s a little too spicy for my liking. So while I will use this as an everyday perfume for the moody vibe I donu2019t think Iu2019d get it again because itu2019s a little too spicy and more masculine then what a unisex perfume would even be. I canu2019t say I smell any vanilla in it at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is so different from everything I have in my collection! I love it so much. Itu2019s sophisticated and grown. The vanilla and musk go great together. Iu2019ve worn it out a couple times and have gotten stopped to ask what Iu2019m wearing. Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Henry Rose in exchange for my opinion. The modern packaging is clean and simple, I love the shape of the bottle. The fragrance is warm & earthy. This fragrance definitely stays all day. I pickup more rose, jasmine, sandalwood & patchouli so while itu2019s not the fragrance for me it is nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Warm and spicy is a good descriptor for this one! I know vanilla can be polarizing with perfumes, and to me this is a little bit cloying but not in a sweet vanilla ice cream kind of way. Definitely getting some spicier florals in there too. When I first spray this one, it is aggressive to my nose. The dry down is a little more laidback. If you're comparing to Char, I'd say Char has more of a sweet warmth vs. Torn having a sharp warmth. I could also see this being worn as a unisex scent - and definitely more of a evening vibe, to me. Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Torn is not your typical vanilla scent. It's not very sweet and has a spicy, earthy edge. The florals in the opening fade quickly for vanilla to take centerstage along with the woody, musky base notes. A scent that makes me feel all warm and cozy. This will be perfect when the cold weather hits. Gifted by henryrose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love!!! This is such a great fragrance I love the vanilla notes itu2019s such a sweet romantic fragrance but not too sweet it wears and lasts all day long! I received so Many compliments on this fragrance. This was gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for the perfect perfume that has vanilla in it that wasn't too sickly sweet and this was just perfection! It's the perfect blend of spice and sweet. I've gotten a ton of complements and it last all day on me. I did noticed that it becomes a softer cozy vanilla by the end of the day, which I really love.  This will be my new signature scent from now on! Complimentary from Henryrose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Henry Rose. Iu2019m torn about Torn. While I didnu2019t like it so much right after applying it - it has a woody spicy note that is just not something I love - the scent that stays on after a couple of hours is amazing. It gets less woody over time, making the vanilla stand out. Overall, itu2019s a nice scent, that I would wear mostly for special occasions since itu2019s a bit overpowering for everyday use. The bottle is pretty too, thereu2019s something special about clear glass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Henry Rose. I love that these sons are so fluid with how they smell and also the packaging. I loved that the outer packaging and box that came in is recyclable and the scent was really really nice. I feel like this would be perfect for the winter time because it does give off a warmer smell. I smelled a lot of vanilla and sandalwood, which are two of my favorite notes in perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Torn Eau de Parfum I was gifted by Henry Rose is a spicy, sultry mix of vanilla bean and vetiver roots. The sandalwood, musk, and patchouli are lovely bottom notes that shine through every time I wear this fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Dare I say, this feels like the most masculine of the Henry Rose scents. I think it still falls on the unisex spectrum but definitely one that a more masculine individual would enjoy. Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m trying to venture out of my comfort zone and try new fragrances. This one, gifted by Henry Rose, is most definitely out of my comfort zone. Itu2019s hard for me to describe the scent, although I do feel as though it is a more high end scent if that makes sense. I typically go for more sweet and warm fragrances that donu2019t always give sophistication, but this one definitely does. I donu2019t know that this will ever be a favorite of mine but it is definitely intriguing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Torn is such a gorgeous, complex fragrance. It smells so expensive and unique. I am very sensitive to smells and fragrances and have had no issues with it. A perfect Fall/Winter scent. Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, how gorgeous as this packaging!! I live for this kind of products because itu2019s so high quality and actually very reasonably priced! I love this sent itu2019s so refreshing and itu2019s perfect for the summer or spring would be a great Motheru2019s Day gift! Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume company knows how to make a strong scented and long lasting scent! This one is by far my favorite out of the ones Iu2019ve tried! It is floral and very fresh! Something I could wear everyday! Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is earthy and a pure vanilla with a touch of floral.  Itu2019s warm and spicy and very sexy.  I definitely prefer it as more of an evening fragrance and would be perfect for the Fall.  The bottle is also simple and beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Henry Rose a bottle of Torn Eau de Parfum. The scent was not overpowering and picked up scents of vanilla and sandalwood. It was a soft scent that was not too florally. I got a lot of compliments and many asked what I was wearing. I would recommend this perfume for those that donu2019t like too strong of perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite Henry Rose scents. Itu2019s warm and spicy with notes of vanilla. Definitely truly gourmand perfume. I love the notes of musk, sandalwood, vetiver. It is both spicy and floral and will compliment very sensual woman. Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Henry Rose. This is a really nice smelling perfume especially for vanilla lovers. It's long lasting and is the perfect blend of sweet and spicy. Every time I wear it everyone around me asks what I'm wearing! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: If you love sandalwood you must try
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Henry Rose. When I first sprayed this I thought it was almost too sweet. Itu2019s thick (in smell not consistently) but thereu2019s something that happens with Henry rose scents when you allow them to bloom. Itu2019s so sexy. Itu2019s deep and interesting and smells sensual. This isnu2019t an everyday wear for me but goodness itu2019s perfect for dates. When you smell this youu2019ll never forget it, also perfect to pair with any vanilla fragrance you have to make it that much better

reviews.review_title: Perfect balance of vanilla and sandalwood for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Henry Rose. I love this scent so much, the predominant notes to me are vanilla and sandalwood, and in my opinion theyu2019re perfectly balanced. It gives the effect of layering perfumes without actually having to do so, itu2019s such a gorgeous blend. It isnu2019t overly sweet or overly spiced as I often find with this profile, itu2019s absolutely gorgeous and the packaging is beautiful as well, very minimalist yet heavy and sturdy! Definitely a go to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful warm fragrance. It smells sweet and warm and feels so cozy. I smell the gourmand vanilla first and then it mixes with warm spicy scents as it settles throughout the day. I absolutely love the minimalistic yet chic bottle. The lasting power is pretty good, it lasts a full work day on me (9+ hours) and I can even still smell it on my hair and clothes after that. Highly recommend! I received this product complimentary from Henry Rose but this is my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The new Henry Rose perfume in Torn is a must-try for anyone who loves a fragrance with a unique blend of spicy and floral notes. The richness of vanilla bean perfectly complements the earthiness of vetiver roots, creating a harmonious and sophisticated scent that lingers for hours. The bottle design is sleek yet simple, making it a beautiful addition to any fragrance collection. Overall, I highly recommend this perfume to anyone who wants to smell amazing and feel confident all day long. This was gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this perfume in exchange for my honest opinion. I love the combination of vanilla and spicy. Itu2019s the perfect nighttime sexy scent. Slightly unisex but more on the feminine side with the vanilla and a tad of floral. Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: (Gifted by Henry Rose and Sephora) ahhh the sweet notes of vanilla and the sultry hints of musk and sandalwood, this perfume will constantly have people asking what you are wearing! It is subtle, yet so elegant. It is my new favorite perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Skeepers and Henry Rose! I honestly adore this scent. Itu2019s warm, woody, slightly sweet, and unisex. The bottle is simple and classy so it looks great on a vanity. I think this scent is appropriate for anytime, and especially night time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got the fragrance Torn gifted by Henry Rose. I thought it would be a sweet scent due to the vanilla notes, but itu2019s less sweet on the dry down. I understand why these could be unisex fragrances since the dry down is more complex and not simply u201csweet feminineu201dscent.  This could work easily as a daytime or nighttime scent as a lovely addition.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Spicy, seductive and long lasting is the voice of Torn. Youu2019re only a spray away from having everyone at the market ask what youu2019re wearing. (Thatu2019s what just happened to me) I love the luxe packaging and unisex is the only way I roll. Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It has a very masculine smell to it in my opinion and itu2019s kinda powdery. Not my fav to be honest and Iu2019m a huge vanilla fan!! I love the bottle as itu2019s super luxurious but Iu2019m not sure if I would get this again. Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: gifted by henry rose. torn is a vanilla forward fragrance. itu2019s quite strong too, for a gourmand. it also has a very distinct sandalwood note that throws it woody and sweet. I really like it for everyday wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s the perfect vanilla scent and my gifted by Henry Rose Torn is my new everyday fragrance. Whatu2019s great about this perfume is that it isnu2019t too sweet or too spicy having the perfect balance. I get so many compliments and canu2019t stop sniffing my wrist because I love this scent! I lapso feel good using Henry Rose because of their dedication to being a clean company.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: Torn is a beautiful scent that will make you feel confident and sophisticated. It's perfect for any occasion, whether you're heading out for a night on the town or simply want to elevate your everyday routine. The fragrance lasts for hours on the skin, and the unique combination of notes ensures that you'll stand out from the crowd. I highly recommend giving Torn a try if you're looking for a new signature scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Henry Rose. As somebody that LOVES vanilla scents - this isnu2019t what I was expecting. I donu2019t get any vanilla at all from this scent personally. However - I do still enjoy this scent and find it to be a clean, sweet scent. This isnu2019t a strong scent but the longevity still seems to be there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Henry Rose. I like to use the Torn Eau De Parfum when I want to smell like warm and sweet vanilla scent.  It makes me feel powerful and alluring. Wearing this perfume has resulted in me receiving many compliments on how nice I smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this perfume is spicy and fragrant, reminds me of fall. If you are a fan of sandalwood and spices, you will fall in love with this perfume. I did!! Itu2019s very long lasting and makes me feel warm! Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is gorgeous! so would qualify as a gender neutral perfume. Definitely a deeper scent but I donu2019t mind that. Overall, after application is lasted throughout the day and many people complimented me on my fragrance. Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is a game-changer!  It sexy and has dark energy vibes that heu2019ll yea I am so here for! After hearing great things about this brand from my friends, I decided to try it out and I was blown away. It's the perfect balance of sweet and spicy notes that leave me feeling confident and refreshed. I love how minimalist the packaging and bottle is.  This perfume was gifted by Henry Rose in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the spicy and floral aroma of this Eau de Parfum! The combination of vanilla bean and vetiver roots creates a unique scent that stands out from other perfumes. The blend of freesia, muguet, rose, violet, and jasmine gives it a refreshing and feminine touch, while the sandalwood, musk, patchouli, vanilla bean, and praline notes give it a warm and comforting feel.    Gifted By Henry Rose
